control

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • control.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    class Controller
extends java.lang.Thread
    This is a class for the controlling of the compression-process for a HyperGraph. This class manages all necessary things for the compression, like the import of new graphs and manages the step-by-step-simulation of the compression. For the step-by-step-simulation of the compression the entire compression process is executed first and then the all steps are simulated step-by-step.
    Author:
    Matthias DÃ¼rksen
